message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.SE 

The paper deals with context-aware access control on mobile devices, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR). The framework presented in the paper uses machine learning to classify contexts, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of sociological surveys to examine user perceptions and concerns, which is related to social informatics (cs.SI). The probabilistic approach used in the framework also involves statistical modeling, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper mentions the integration of the framework with the FlaskDroid architecture for access control enforcement, which is related to software engineering (cs.SE).
